```{r, echo=FALSE}
require(fselect)
require(ggplot2)
require(latex2exp)
```

# cPCA Example

We simulate data with n=100, d=20 and visualize the first 2 dimensions:
```{r}
testdat <- fs.sims.rtrunk(100, 20)
X <- testdat$X
Y <- testdat$Y

data <- data.frame(x1=X[,1], x2=X[,2], y=Y)
data$y <- factor(data$y)
ggplot(data, aes(x=x1, y=x2, color=y)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab(TeX("$x_1$")) +
  ylab(TeX("$x_2$")) +
  ggtitle("Simulated Data")
```

Projecting with LRLDA to 3 dimensions and visualizing the top 2:

```{r}
result <- fs.project.lrlda(X, Y, 3)

data <- data.frame(x1=result$Xr[,1], x2=result$Xr[,2], y=Y)
data$y <- factor(data$y)
ggplot(data, aes(x=x1, y=x2, color=y)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab(TeX("$x_1$")) +
  ylab(TeX("$x_2")) +
  ggtitle("Projected Data using LRLDA")
```
